name: Magic Runes (itch)
description:
Some times ago the forest was so beautiful... But evil curse removed all colors from trees, flowers, lake. All nature is now dark and only magic runes can recover it. It is your task - to return life to forest nature.

On each level of the game you will have the level task: runes combination which can return colors to some forest object - to tree, to bushes, to flowers etc. You need to repeat exactly the given combination placing runes in correct order.
